name: roastbeet
text: A comment left by roastbeet was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by MrMojoRisin, reburn, cashprizes, Ambala)

name: shutup_shutup
text: There's only two of them.  Should Lyle just toss it off to his left?

name: freakscene
text: ...lie bot?

name: dybrar
text: Lie Bot!

name: nyu
text: Those are the biggest most comfortable looking pillows Ive ever seen

name: qwerty
text: They just look big compared to the two stuffed animals who are using them while smoking weed.

name: saint
text:
game, set, and match.

afterparty at the Olive Garden.

name: johnnyrocker
text:
Man that just looks like a fun way to spend a day even if you aren't sick. Getting stoned in bed with friends...

Dang man, I got some phone calls to make.

name: em2
text: "Sick Day" Party at my place. Call everyone you know. BYOP (Bring Your Own Pillow).

name: greyfield
text: Fluffy pillows, weed, and Jack Daniels. Oh, why dost thou taunt me, Achewood?

name: sparhawk
text: I hear your avatar's heavy teutonic screaming of every word you write. It is out rage ous.

name: overmedicated
text: Lyle makes a damn good point, my sick leave forms don't even MENTION permission of fatties.

name: bron
text: That's just a normal day.

name: abe
text: That is basically the most classy way to ask for a hit ever.

name: mortshire
text: agreed. five-fold.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: I've tried this home remedy. It usually ends up being a lateral move; not better or worse, but sort of more difficult and interesting. It's definitely a good hangover cure (gotta go light on the hair of the dog, though).

name: evolume
text: This move has put me into bed more times than it has gotten me out of it.

name: rapid_roy
text: Is Lyle drinking whiskey or Achewater ? Either is a fine choice.

name: brokeaccount
text: It's 'Recurring Bourbon'.

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: this is why i want a comfy bed in my living room

name: f1shst1ck
text: Greatest sick day ever

name: iorek
text: word up, lyle.

name: direhaggis
text: Teodor knows a good situation when he sees one.

name: tetrisattack
text: Téodor is more of a pipe guy; he will surely fish-lip it.

name: tekende
text: Fish-lip?

name: rowboat
text: Fish lipping: to make the end of a joint wet with one's saliva before passing. See also: "n word-lipping."

name: spectre
text: Let's see . . . somebody with the flu offers you a toke. The weed is good, but there will be flu virus on the joint. What to do, oh what to do?

name: philosophe
text: Toast the mouth end, bro. That's what we do if someone's sick or they slobber all over the J.

name: i_love_kate
text: That doesn't make sense. Unless you've got some kind of bizarre three-tipped joint, you'd be puffing on the side that was previously lit. Even if you put it out, it'd be all ashes and such.

name: goro
text: Well, you just toast it, you know, like when you just finished rolling one and it's a bit too moist along it's side. You don't go all burning it and such.

name: rowboat
text: It's better to just have more than one pipe laying around. If someone's sick, they just get their own.

name: lemnlime2
text: Silly, everyone knows smoking kills germs.

name: molesticide
text:
i'm glad that in my circle of friends, we aren't required to get in bed in order to pass a joint around.

i would think lyle, at least, would think this a little strange.

name: deusoma
text: Lyle believes there is no greater job in all the world than having meaningless sex with women who were recently men. You've got to remember who you're talking about, here.

name: fineoakstructure
text: I think you forgot the main thing about that: he was also paid to do it.

name: hateandwar
text: He said it was a job man.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Hmm.  I don't think this strip is in my copy of the first book...

name: greymantledwolf
text: sick stylin'

name: ushiewhispaz
text: Last time I was sick, this is pretty much how it went. Roll a friend and hit up some Seagrams 7 Crown.

name: dont_think
text: That is one fat blunt.

name: brynito
text: This is my flu, cold, mopin' and wallowin' cure. Works almost every time, and when it doesn't....it was still hella worth it.

name: snowman
text: I want to lie in bed, drink whiskey and smoke pot and watch television with Lyle all day.

name: coco
text: I like how Lyle's pinky is raised. The weed must be exquisite.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: Of course.  He is a connoisseur.

name: foetus_punch
text: I just really want to do this.

name: confusion
text:
I don't know about anyone else, but this is how I spend all my sick days.

That might explain why I take so many of them.

name: chachibenji
text: This looks like the most comfortable and amazing thing to do ever.

name: hamscout
text:
All those sick days I spent hunched over the commodore 64 plugged into my TV... when I coulda been...

DAMMIT!

name: puguglypress
text: Man, this stupid strip is no better than a webcomic.

name: ratacattt
text: test

name: ratacattt
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: ratacattt
text: TEST

name: ratacattt
text: test

name: rowboat
text:
And here's where your evil began.

You won. You made this place less cool. Congratulations.

name: mashisoyo
text: Lyle's face... sort of comes and goes.
